description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Louis N. POKRESS v. Vaughn B. CONNELLY
**판결일**: 1958-06-03
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Carroll, Chas, Horton, Pearson

## 변호인

Harold B. Spaet, Miami Beach, for appellant., J. B. Patterson, Ronald B. Sladon, ^port Lauderdale, and Richard T. Shankweiler, Miami, for appellee.

## 인용

- 103 So. 2d 127

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
Affirmed on the authority of McAllister Hotel, Inc., v. Porte, Fla.1957, 98 So.2d 781.
CARROLL, CHAS., C. J., and HORTON and PEARSON, JJ., concur.
